text: Vadim Yuryevich Karpov (; born 14 July 2002) is a Russian football player. He currently plays for CSKA Moscow as a Defender. He made his professional debut on 19 September 2019 in an Europa League game against PFC Ludogorets Razgrad at the age of 17. == References == Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:Association football defenders
title: Vadim Karpov
